'''Ralph Damiani''' is a Brazilian artist known for his many illustrations of [[Middle-earth]] and the Harry Potter universe. Ralph has worked together with a number of well-known Tolkien YouTubers such as [[Council of the Rings]], [[Nerd of the Rings]], [[Lore of the Rings]] and [[Steven Gibb (Youtube Channel)|Steven Gibb]]. 

In 2022 he was nominated for [[The Tolkien Society]] Awards 2022 Best Artwork for his 'Across Arda' artworks.<ref>https://www.tolkiensociety.org/2022/04/winners-of-the-tolkien-society-awards-2022-announced/</ref>
